text: total = @ mean = @ rainfallArray = [] for i in 0, 12 output "Please enter rainfall for month"â„¢, i+l input rain append rain to rainfallArray total += rain mean = total/12 output "Total rainfall: ", total output "Mean rainfall: ", mean output "Months above mean: " for i in 0, 12 if rainfall[i] > mean output i+l
